Text: E̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼuwe̩ wʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ ne̩ le̩, kʼi la mʼabo uche̩ichi chi rinyo̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩, owñ chʼabo He̩t kpai abo Girgash kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo Kenan kpai Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Hifai kpai abo Je̩bius, amuche̩ichi amone̩ mebie ku ma wewe ku ma la ño̩ gbiti tʼuwe̩ le le̩,
oñ e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼabo le̩ jo̩ ñw e̩, kʼuwe̩ la fʼuma gwoda; e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki ko ma jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko; uwe̩ ki kpʼalo okate kpai ama n, uwe̩ ki la li ejumomi-ma n.
Uwe̩ ki la ne̩ ma chʼo̩ya n, ama ki nʼabobule̩ e-me̩ n; uwe̩ ki dʼo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpʼo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, uwe̩ ki la ne̩ o̩ma-ma onobule̩ ñw o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n.
Todu i arʼo̩ma-we̩ da bʼumi ubi te̩, kʼama ki re̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩: abe̩le̩ tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ma atajo bʼuwe̩ ma, oñ i ma fʼe̩ chile̩che̩ piopio.
Ama abu kʼame̩ ache ama de̩: ame̩ ki gu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-ma lo̩, ku me̩ la kpʼojibo-ma fo̩, me̩ ki fʼAshe̩rim-ma lo̩ rinyo̩, ku me̩ nʼuna gu ojibo-ma ku ma gbe̩ jo̩.
Todu uwe̩ chʼamone̩ ki afo̩ todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼuwe̩ chi kʼe̩ chʼamone̩ kʼowñ onugo ane̩, kwef amone̩ du ku ma jo̩ ile̩-i.
E̩do̩ Jihofa la gamʼume̩ kʼi la fʼume̩ chi ñw o̩la-wñ, ukpe̩ ku me̩ wewe tʼamone̩ du le n; todu uwewe-me̩ nya tʼamone̩ du le;
chai todabu ki Jihofa afe̩do̩ me̩, kpai todabu kʼi ade o̩la kʼi go̩ ñw amata-me̩, todule̩ Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti ko me̩ dufu wa-i, oñ i fʼume̩ la kwef unyi adu tane̩, kwef o̩wo̩ Fero onu Ijipti.

Todule̩ uwe̩ ki ma ka ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, O̩jo̩ owñ che, O̩jo̩ kʼi achubi one̩, e-kʼi ade alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo abo ku ma fe̩do̩ owñ, ku ma la de uko̩-wñ, gbogbo tʼo̩gba o̩gba icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩,
i la aro̩me̩ ñw abo ku ma chulaka owñ ejugede, owñ chʼeje̩ ñwu ma lenyo̩ rʼile̩; i ache̩du ugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi achutaka-wñ n, i aro̩me̩ ñw u ejugede.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki de uko̩ le̩ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai oji ajo̩ e-kʼomi ñwa ñw e̩ eñini, kʼe̩ che tʼeju-wñ.
Tak i awatu, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ netiru oji ajo̩-i, kʼame̩ fʼu de ku me̩ la che tʼeju-wñ maku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ kpʼuwe̩;

i afe̩do̩ we̩, i la adʼe̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, i lañʼaje̩ ñw e̩ wewe nyo̩gba; i ñʼade̩nyo̩ ñw ugbe̩ año̩la-we̩ kpai e̩ro ane̩-we̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩-we̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ etito̩ kpai e̩kpo-we̩ kpai amo̩ma amokuno̩-we̩ kpai unawo ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini, oj ane̩ e-kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ ka kʼi adu ñw e̩.
Uwe̩ i ade̩nyo̩ ñw u tʼamone̩ du le; tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼagaji adʼefu-me̩ n, i la adʼefu ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ n.
Jihofa la akʼo̩ga du bʼe̩ o̩la te̩; i ñʼadʼo̩ga e̩bie̩ne̩ e-Ijipti okate e-kʼe̩ ma le̩, bʼe̩ ma n, i muda akʼo bʼabo ku ma chulaka-we̩ ma.
Uwe̩ ki la fʼamone̩ du e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ako nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ liye̩; e̩ ki li ejumomi-ma n; e̩ ki la re̩ amo̩jo̩-ma n; todu e-le̩ achʼoku ñw e̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ aka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, Abo uche̩ichi-i nana tʼumi le, ab u nale kʼu nabʼuma gba e̩wñ-ma?
E̩ ki railo ma n: uwe̩ ki muda dibekado e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ che Fero kpai abo Ijipti chaka,

owñ chʼajama inaina kʼeju-we̩ li le̩ kpai ujiwe kpai e̩wñ uno̩ kpai o̩wo̩ e̩gbiti kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩, e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ne̩ du we̩ dufu wa le̩; abe̩le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ache amone̩ du kʼailo-ma aba me̩.
Anubile̩ ge̩, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñʼakpʼamanukpe uche̩ rʼefu-ma, gbogbo tak abo ki bo̩ ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja ñwu me̩ ki lenyo̩.
E̩ ki chokpo ma n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼalumeji-we̩, O̩jo̩ inaina kʼi abailo i che.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ la ako abo uche̩ichi le̩ ro̩ rinyo̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩ pe̩pe̩pe̩pe̩; uwe̩ aneke fʼuma liye̩ e̩gbakate n, tode̩gba kʼame̩wñ iñmi oko awewe bʼuwe̩ ma.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ muda ako ma nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩gba-we̩, i anʼe̩wñ uchobi inaina dʼuma utu gbogbo taku ma chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ kpa.
Owñ la akʼamonu nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, tak uwe̩ ki che kʼodu-ma ki lenyo̩ bʼo̩gane̩ efojale-i te̩; i anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi aneke dago o̩gba-we̩ gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ kpa n.

Ame̩ ki nʼuna gu ojibo amo̩jo̩-ma ku ma gbe̩ jo: ajifa kpai o̩jamalia ki dʼo̩la-ma ki nyo̩ we̩ eju kʼe̩ ne̩ n, uwe̩ ki la agba ñw o̩la-we̩ n, tode̩gba kʼi amʼe̩; todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ i che ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki la dʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ wʼef unyi-we̩ kʼuwe̩ ki mud e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ dab owñ n in; i ki chʼe̩wñ ulaka-we̩, kʼi la chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw e̩; todu e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ i che.
